alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON...GULF AND CENTRAL CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA...WESTERN GADSDEN...LIBERTY AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA THROUGH 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greensboro to 7 miles northeast of Port St. Joe. This storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Gretna, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Selman, Abe Springs, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, and Central City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty
